title: 关于指令的问题 急急急！
author: q810365671
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: rooke_zb
replies.txt_content:
1.8~1.10版本：/summon ArmorStand ~ ~ ~ {Invisible:1b,Invulnerable:1b,NoGravity:1b,CustomName:"要写的文字",CustomNameVisible:1}复制代码
1.11以上版本：/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {Invisible:1b,Invulnerable:1b,NoGravity:1b,CustomName:"要写的文字",CustomNameVisible:1}复制代码
